item.title: About Michael Francis
item.description: I am a Senior Software Engineer with ten years of experience primarily building full stack web applications. My jobs have always kept me working with web applications, but outside of work I have enjoyed working on other projects including game developmnet and machine learning. Email: mfrancis107@gmail.com Twitter: @mfrancis107 Experience Sr. Software Engineer at Smart Data (July 2019 - Current) Worked directly with multiple clients including Google Built content management system with a python backend and a React/Typescript frontend.
